name: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon

organizer.name: Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) / The Linux Foundation

description: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon is the Cloud Native Computing Foundationâ€™s (CNCF) flagship conference, bringing together adopters and developers of open source and cloud native technologies. The event focuses on Kubernetes, Prometheus, Envoy, and the entire cloud native ecosystem, with key themes covering platform engineering, AI integration, security, and GitOps. Ticket pricing reflects the range from the student/academic pass (min) to the corporate all-access pass (max), which includes co-located events.
